results.title: Tales of ordinary madness = Storie di ordinaria follia
results.creator_credit: Jacqueline Ferreri, 23 Giugno, Ginis Film and Marco Ferreri
results.brief_description: Based on beat poet and counter culture celebrity Charles Bukowski’s booze soaked autobiographical writings “Erections, ejaculations, exhibitions and general tales of ordinary madness”. Directed with raw candor by Marco Ferreri (‘La Grande bouffe’, ‘The Last woman’), ‘Tales of ordinary madness’ stars Ben Gazarra as Bukowski’s alter ego - Charles Serking, a down and out poet living in Los Angeles, his writing fueled by booze, casual sex and the freedom his life style offers. When he meets Cass (Ornella Muti), a masochistic prostitute into self mutilation, Serking instantly falls for her, embarking on a passionate and self destructive affair. Cast also includes Susan Tyrell, Tania Lopert, Roy Brocksmith, Katia Berger.

results.title: Tales of mystery and imagination
results.creator_credit: Les Films Marceau - Cocinor, Produzioni Europee Associati, Louis Malle, Roger Vadim and Federico Fellini
results.brief_description: Tales of mystery and imagination brings together three short films by three of France’s greatest directors, based on the stories by Edgar Allan Poe. “William Wilson’s sketch” directed by Louis Malle and starring Terence Stamp. “Metzengerstein” directed by Roger Vadim and starring Jane Fonda. “Don’t bet heads” directed by Frederico Fellini and starring Brigit Bardot. Each one features a strange tale with an unexpected twist and thought-provoking performances from the stars.

results.title: Tales of Helpmann : A Portrait of Sir Robert Helpmann
results.creator_credit: Don Featherstone Productions, Primetime Television and Don Featherstone
results.brief_description: A skilfully compiled documentary of Sir Robert Helpmann that combines lavish film extracts, rare black and white film, noteworthy photographic stills from shows and interviews with the stars that knew him. Protege of Pavlova and Fonteyn’s first partner, Helpmann was the most versatile theatrical talent of his time as he traversed careers in dance, acting, choreography, theatre directing and film performance.

results.title: Tales of gods and demons
results.brief_description:
Episode number 6 of Series “Journey into Thailand”.
Describes the history of the masked ballet performed by Thai dancers. Explains the dance drama Ramakein and the myths and legends from which it originates.

results.title: Tales of Beatrix Potter
results.creator_credit: Richard Goodwin, EMI/Parlophone and Reginald Mills
results.brief_description: Dancers of the Royal Ballet perform classic stories from the tales of Beatrix Potter bringing to life many of her best-loved characters - Mrs Tiggy-Winkle, Pigling Bland, Squirrel Nutkin and many more. They were the tales we loved as children and still hold with great affection as adults. Brilliantly designed by Christine Edzard, and beautifully danced by some of the great names of the Royal Ballet. This is one of the most charming and ingenious ballet films of recent years.

results.title: Tales from two schools
results.brief_description: Work created by students from Tarnagulla and Marong primary schools with animator Paul Fletcher as part of the Artists in Schools Project sponsored by the Department of Education and Arts Victoria. Contains original artwork by the students (from lower primary levels) that has been animated by the artist, footage of the students and animations created by the older students. Storyline is minimal but includes a flying potato adventure, a monster circus and experimental animation.

results.title: Tales from other worlds
results.creator_credit: Robin Bates, National Academy of Sciences (U.S.) and WQED
results.brief_description:
Episode number 4 of Series “Planet earth”.
Voyages to other planets have shown us that earth is unique. The question now is why? Through the use of little-seen footage shot in space, this program attempts to answer questions such as why there is no life on Mars and Venus, why the dinosaurs disappeared, whether earth has been bombarded by meteorites in the past. A fascinating look at the formation of the planets.

results.title: Tales from Caramut Footy
results.brief_description: The Caramut Football Club brings the locals together and keeps the community spirit alive. Whether slogging it out on the field, helping out in the canteen or just cheering on from the sidelines, the locals appreciate their footy and as the community grows, it is a great place to catch up and stay connected.
